title: HRIS - Flutter
description: A capstone project for PLSP, HRIS is a comprehensive system designed to manage employees, daily time records (DTR), and additional special features tailored for organizational needs.

title: GAD Attribution System
description: A GAD Attribution System that leverages an NLP model to analyze files and recommend proposed budgets for projects within designated sectors.

title: Lab Tour
description: A Lab Tour system showcasing a 360-degree view of laboratories at San Pablo High School using Panolens.js for immersive virtual exploration.

title: Math Quest
description: MathQuest is a classic Pok√©mon-inspired game designed to teach students basic math concepts in an engaging and interactive way.

title: Inventory Management System - STI
description: An Inventory Management System for STI San Pablo, featuring a web-based platform integrated with a mobile app for QR code scanning to streamline inventory tracking.

title: Mangata POS
description: Mangata POS is a point-of-sale system designed to streamline transactions, manage inventory, and generate reports for businesses, providing an efficient and user-friendly interface for sales management.

title: Sapling
description: Sapling is a student assistant app that offers essential tools like a scientific calculator, dictionary, to-do list, and reminders to help students stay organized and productive.

title: MJ Tea Cafe
description: MJTea Cafe Landing Page is a one-page website designed to showcase the offerings, ambiance, and details of MJ Tea Cafe, providing visitors with a sleek and engaging introduction to the brand.

title: Calendar Scheduler
description: Calendar Schedule is a web-based calendar application with a login system that allows users to RSVP and manage events with friends, simplifying event scheduling and coordination.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: Pomodoro is a time management app featuring a Pomodoro timer, to-do list, and a login system to track progress and maintain records of completed tasks.
